item.title: Rossmann stores sales prediction
item.description:
A complete project done in a Data Science and Machine Learning course.

In the course, we learn the lifecycle of a Data Science project. Starting from understanding the business problem, going through the solution development and finally doing full deployment to the production environment.

The final solution is a Telegram bot that makes total sales predictions for any given store. The underlying Machine Learning algorithm learned from a dataset containing 1,115 stores and more than 1 million sales records.

We used:

  • Python
  • Pandas
  • Seaborn
  • Scikit-learn
  • Flask
  • Telegram bot API
  • Heroku

Check full project documentation at GitHub: https://github.com/brunokatekawa/Curso_DS_Prod
